--- title: "Software, Data, and Research Compendia" format: html: from: markdown+autolink_bare_uris --- ```{=html} ```
Scott, E. R., Orians, C. M., Schweiger, R., Dukes, J. S., & Müller, C. (2024). Code for  “Combined impacts of prolonged drought and warming on plant size and foliar chemistry” (v1.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.11217919
Riemer, K., Scott, E. R., & Meredith, L. K. (2023). volcalc: Calculate Volatility of Chemical Compounds (v2.1.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10392821
Weiss, J., & Scott, E. R. (2023). azmetr: Access Arizona weather data from the AZMet API (v0.2.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10044639
Ewinghill, T., Scott, E. R., & Guo, J. (2023). Code for “University of Arizona Cooperative Extension Needs Assessment 2022 Dashboard.” Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7931082
Scott, E. R., Jackson, E. D., Casolaro, C., Nebeker, R. S., Dukes, J. S., Griffin, T., & Orians, C. M. (2023). Code and data from: Current and legacy effects of precipitation treatments on growth and nutrition in contrasting crops (v1.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7817780
Scott, E. R., & Bruna, E. M. (2022). bdffpRain: Rain gauge data from the Biological Dynamics of Forest Fragments project (v0.0.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6557721
Scott, E. R. (2022). BrunaLab/bdffp-cmip6: Downloading and wrangling CMIP6 model output for the Biological Dynamics of Forest Fragments Project region (v1.0.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6558264
Scott, E. R., & Bruna, E. M. (2021). BrunaLab/HeliconiaDemography: Data and Code for: Scott ER, Uriarte M, Bruna EM (2021) Delayed effects of climate on vital rates lead to demographic divergence in Amazonian forest fragments. Global Change Biology. (v1.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5608621
Scott, E. R. (2021). bumbl: Tools for modeling bumblebee colony growth and decline (v1.0.1). https://doi.org/10.5281/ZENODO.4545782
Scott, E. R. (2021). Aariq/leafhopper-observational: Research compendium for “Differing non-linear, lagged effects of temperature and precipitation on an insect herbivore and its host plant” (v2.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4557659
Scott, E. R. (2021). Aariq/PCA-vs-PLS: Research compendium for “Using the right tool for the job: the difference between unsupervised and supervised analyses of multivariate ecological data” (v2.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4557672
Scott, E. R. (2020). Data and analysis for: Changes in tea plant secondary metabolite profiles as a function of leafhopper density and damage (v1.1.2). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3706927
Scott, E. R. (2019). holodeck: A Tidy Interface for Simulating Multivariate Data. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.2641200
